name: Paper Jam
description:
Paper Jam is a compilation of 4 mouse-controlled games, each primarily developed in 1 week.

Honu:
Honu is a game where the player acts as a vetinary nurse. The player must use different tools to save the turtle, who has been entangled in plastic from swimming in the ocean.

Astrolabe:
Astrolabe is a game where you align stars in the galaxy to form constellations by matching them to the pictures in the background.

Colour Path:

In Colour Path the aim is to get to the portal by navigating through a maze of coloured discs. Make your way through the maze by launching and sticking to discs coloured the same as the player while avoiding discs of another colour.

The Raid:

The sun is setting. They need a beacon. Guide them in.
